rows.translation: In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful.
By (the Token of) Time (through the ages),

rows.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ
rows.translation: Except such as have Faith, and do righteous deeds, and (join together) in the mutual teaching of Truth, and of Patience and Constancy.
rows.transliteration: illal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti watawāṣaw bil ḥaqqi watawāṣaw biṣ ṣabr
